metadata.title: BESTonZON European Style Wine Rack Plastic Water Bottle Display Mat Wine Holder Storage Organizer for Kitchen Countertops Pantry Fridge (White/2.9"/7.4cm per Groove)
features: With anti-skid bottom design, the mat prevents containers from slipping or rolling.
Suitable For - Suitable for household daily use, hotel furnishings, wine cellar collection, etc.

Non-Slip and Space saving - The bottom is non-slip, stable and not afraid of overturning the drink. The bottle's stand-alone rack is suitable for any space, eliminating unnecessary mess on the top of the counter or bar in seconds, enabling versatile storage.
Wave Groove Design - With wave groove design, wine bottles can be easily stacked ,that it can simultaneously receive 10 bottles of wine.
Eco-Friendly Material - Our horizontal wine storage rack, made of food grade PP material, safe and healthy, can be assured with food.
description: This kind of horizontal wine storage rack, made of food grade PP material, safe and healthy, can be assured to contact with food. With wave groove design, wine bottles can be easily stacked ,that it can simultaneously secures up 10 bottles of wine. Perfectly sized for kitchen counter top.

- Color: White. - Material: PP. - Size: Approx. 29.3 x 9.8 x 2.3cm. - Grooved mat enables pyramidal, for horizontal stacking of bottles, cans, and jars. - With anti-skid bottom design, the mat prevents containers from slipping or rolling. - Each mat secures up to 10 wine bottles. Doesn't take up as much space on your refrigerator shelves as packs or dispensers. - Secures bottles, cans, and sealed jars. Also fits in coolers and mini fridges.
1 x plastic wine rack (White/2.9"/7.4cm per Groove)
